summary.p: A mathematical function that returns the angle, in radians, whose cosine is the specified double expression; also called arccosine.

param.name: value
param.p: A number representing a cosine, where -1 ≤ value ≤ 1.

returns.p: An angle, θ, measured in radians, such that 0 ≤ θ ≤ π

examples.sampleCode: SELECT 'The ACOS of the angle -1 is: ' + TO_STRING(ACOS(-1)) AS Result
